conversations.conversation:
A pencilmaker taught da pencil 5 important lessons:
;1.Evryth u do will always leave a mark.
;
;2.U cn always correct de mistakes u mk.
;
;3.Whats important is what's inside u.
;P
;4.In life u will undergo painful sharpenings which will mk u a betr pencil.
;
;5.To b de best pencil u must allow urslf 2 b held & guided by de Hand dat holds u.
;
;Let de hand of God hold u 2 b de best pencil.
;MAY GOD ALWAYS KIP UA CANDLE BURNING.
